    • Method Detail

      • getAttributes

        @NotNull
public @NotNull Attributes getAttributes()
        Returns:
        The attributes of a player. This includes their health, defence, and mana.

      • getLastSkillUpdate

        @Nullable
public @Nullable SkillUpdate getLastSkillUpdate()
        Get the last skill progress update the player received via the action bar. Notice the timestamp when this update occurred, as it may get stale. Returns null if no progress update was received yet
        Returns:
        The last skill update

      • getCurrentItemCharges

        @Nullable
public @Nullable ItemCharges getCurrentItemCharges()
        Get the item charges if the player currently holds an item that has such charges, like the Zombie Sword, Ornate Zombie Sword or Scorpion Foil (Scorpion Foil calls them tickers). Returns null if the player does not hold such an item.
        Returns:
        Charges for the current item if they exist

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        Skyblock health attribute - not vanilla! Default for new profiles is 100.
        Returns:
        The player's current health

      • getMaxHealth

        public int getMaxHealth()
        Skyblock health attribute - not vanilla! Default for new profiles is 100.
        Returns:
        The player's maximum health

      • getMana

        public int getMana()
        Skyblock mana attribute. Default for new profiles is 100. Mana does not equal intelligence!
        Returns:
        The player's current mana

      • getMaxMana

        public int getMaxMana()
        Skyblock mana attribute. Default for new profiles is 100. Mana does not equal intelligence!
        Returns:
        The player's maximum mana

      • getDefense

        public int getDefense()
        Skyblock defense attribute. Default for new profiles is 0.
        Returns:
        The player's defense

      • getWandHealing

        public int getWandHealing()
        Amount of health per second the player is regenerating while using a healing wand or 0 if the player is not using one.
        Returns:
        Health per second from active healing wand

      • getActivePowerOrb

        @Nullable
public @Nullable PowerOrb getActivePowerOrb()
        Get the currently active PowerOrb taking effect on the player. Returns null if the player is not in range of an active PowerOrb. If the player is in range of multiple orbs, returns the one with the highest priority.
        Returns:
        Active PowerOrb

      • setLastSkillUpdate

        public void setLastSkillUpdate(SkillUpdate lastSkillUpdate)

        This should not be used outside SkyblockLib!

        Set the last skill progress update.
        Parameters:
        lastSkillUpdate - The skill update

      • setCurrentItemCharges

        public void setCurrentItemCharges(ItemCharges currentItemCharges)

        This should not be used outside SkyblockLib!

        Set the current item charges. Set null to reset
        Parameters:
        currentItemCharges - The charges
